title: Lawrence Frames Hinged Double (Horizontal) Black Wood Picture Frame, Gallery Collection, 5 by 7-Inch
features: Contemporary black wood frame that will compliment any décor
Constructed of wood with a satin black painted finish; includes high quality black backing
A classic studio frame design also available in many other sizes
Holds two 5-Inch by 7-Inch photos (horizontal); overall dimensions 14.38-Inch by 5.63-Inch by 1-1/4-Inch
description: This wood picture frame is the same you will find in studios and galleries and is the perfect frame for simply and elegantly framing any image. It is a high quality wood frame joined in the corners with a "spline" joint. The molding is approximately 1/2-Inch and is the perfect frame to use for a wall gallery. This picture frame comes individually boxed, and includes high quality black wood backing with an easel for vertical or horizontal tabletop display, and hangers for wall mounting.
